author: bodewig
msg: Make webwork pass at the cost of two new installed packages.
both come with source, multipartrequest even has a CVS repo at
sourceforge, but both have now means to build them in an automated

author: conor
msg: Change the mutant nags to come from me.

author: rubys
msg: Since xdoclet does not seem able to keep up with the changes to xjavadoc
(Despite being in the same CVS!), switch to a tagged version of xjavadoc.
Since sending nags to Peter's email does not seem to produce results
(Despite it being him that set it up!), switch to alexandria-dev.

author: vmassol
msg: added support for optional user, password and hostname attributes (for example if you have a local CVS server and are using the :local: protocol, you cannot specify these parameters)

author: bodewig
msg: JMeter now depends on some Avalon stuff.
